osint_resources.name: X-Ray Contact
osint_resources.purpose: Email address investigation, domain intelligence, and breach-related OSINT

osint_resources.name: Social Catfish
osint_resources.purpose: People search, identity verification, username and image OSINT

osint_resources.name: IRBIS
osint_resources.purpose: Threat intelligence and cyber reconnaissance platform

osint_resources.name: Shodan
osint_resources.purpose: Search engine for internet-connected devices, servers, and IoT exposure

osint_resources.name: FOFA
osint_resources.purpose: Global asset discovery, attack surface mapping, and reconnaissance

osint_resources.name: Censys
osint_resources.purpose: Internet-wide scanning for hosts, certificates, and infrastructure intelligence

osint_resources.name: Have I Been Pwned
osint_resources.purpose: Check if email addresses or accounts appear in known data breaches

osint_resources.name: DeHashed
osint_resources.purpose: Search engine for leaked credentials, breached databases, and OSINT research

osint_resources.name: Twilio
osint_resources.purpose: Phone number intelligence, SMS, and communications-related OSINT context

osint_resources.name: Pastebin
osint_resources.purpose: Monitor leaked text, credentials, code snippets, and threat actor dumps

osint_resources.name: OSINT Framework
osint_resources.purpose: Structured collection of OSINT tools categorized by investigation type

osint_resources.name: WiGLE
osint_resources.purpose: Wireless network mapping, SSID and BSSID geolocation intelligence

osint_resources.name: VirusTotal
osint_resources.purpose: Malware, file, URL, and hash analysis using multiple antivirus engines

osint_resources.name: Malware Bazaar
osint_resources.purpose: Malware sample repository for threat research and incident response

osint_resources.name: Zero-Day Database
osint_resources.purpose: Vulnerability and exploit information database for security research
